title: Launcher does not launch
body: When i launched League of Legends from my desktop. i would get a notification stating that the PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. I uninstalled and re-installed all League of Legends related files, yet the issue still remains. Please help.

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors typically point towards issues with the way League has been configured to interact with other files and packages it relies on. I strongly recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
